subtitle: afterwards called the Countess de Wintselsheim in Germany : being the person known by the name of the Lady Roxana in the time of Charles II
title: Roxana, the fortunate mistress, or, A history of the life and vast variety of fortunes of Mademoiselle de Beleau
subjects: Great Britain -- History -- Charles II, 1660-1685 -- Fiction
by_statement: Daniel Defoe ; edited with an introduction and notes by John Mullan.
other_titles: History of the life and vast variety of fortunes of Mademoiselle de Beleau

notes.value:
Includes bibliographical references.
"This edition uses the rare first edition text, with a new introduction, detailed notes, textual history, and a map"--Cover.
